metadata.title: CVE-2017-9031 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The WebUI component in Deluge before 1.3.15 contains a directory traversal vulnerability involving a request in which the name of the render file is not associated with any template file.

criterions.comment: deluge package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.15-2').
